TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit X509ServiceCertificateAuthentication extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示用戶端 Proxy 用來驗證服務憑證的設定，而這份憑證是使用 SSL/TLS 交涉所取得。

span.span: Represents the settings used by the client proxy to authenticate service certificates that are obtained using SSL/TLS negotiation.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用這個類別。The following example shows how to use this class. [!code-csharp[S_UEX509ServiceCertificateAuthentication#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uex509servicecertificateauthentication/cs/client.cs#4)] [!code-vb[S_UEX509ServiceCertificateAuthentication#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uex509servicecertificateauthentication/vb/client.vb#4)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::Security::X509CertificateValidationMode CertificateValidationMode { System::ServiceModel::Security::X509CertificateValidationMode get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Security::X509CertificateValidationMode value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定憑證驗證模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the certificate validation mode.
A value from the enumeration in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個列舉型別所擷取的選項，可用來判定使用 SSL/TLS 交涉所取得之服務憑證的有效性。This enumeration captures the options for determining the validity of the service certificate obtained using SSL/TLS negotiation. 如需列舉型別成員的清單，請參閱 。For a list of the enumeration members, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何設定這個屬性。The following code shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[S_UEX509ServiceCertificateAuthentication#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uex509servicecertificateauthentication/cs/client.cs#0)] [!code-vb[S_UEX509ServiceCertificateAuthentication#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uex509servicecertificateauthentication/vb/client.vb#0)] 這個屬性也可以在組態檔中設定。The property can also be set in a configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Selectors::X509CertificateValidator ^ CustomCertificateValidator { System::IdentityModel::Selectors::X509CertificateValidator ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Selectors::X509CertificateValidator ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定自訂用戶端憑證驗證程式。

span.span: Gets or sets a custom client certificate validator.

value.span: 自訂用戶端憑證驗證程式。

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 會提供預設的用戶端憑證驗證程式，這個驗證程式會向受信任人存放區驗證該用戶端憑證，也會檢查憑證是否屬於連接到有效根之鏈結的一部分。 provides a default client certificate validator that verifies the client certificate against the trusted people store and also checks that the certificate is part of a chain that connects to a valid root. 您可以實作自訂驗證程式來取得不同的行為。A custom validator can be implemented to obtain a different behavior. 這個屬性允許指定自訂驗證程式。This property allows a custom validator to be specified. ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何設定這個屬性。The following code shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[S_UEX509ServiceCertificateAuthentication#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uex509servicecertificateauthentication/cs/client.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_UEX509ServiceCertificateAuthentication#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uex509servicecertificateauthentication/vb/client.vb#1)] 這個屬性也可以在組態檔中設定。The property can also be set in a configuration file.

exception.span: 已嘗試在認證處於唯讀狀態時設定。

span.span: Attempted to set when credential is read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509RevocationMode RevocationMode { System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509RevocationMode get(); void set(System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509RevocationMode value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 ChainTrust 和 PeerOrChainTrust X.509 憑證驗證模式的憑證撤銷模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the certificate revocation mode for ChainTrust and PeerOrChainTrust X.509 certificate validation mode.

value.span: 中的其中一個值：、 或 。

span.span: One of the values in : , , or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用憑證時，系統會檢查用戶端憑證不在撤銷憑證清單中，驗證用戶端憑證尚未遭到撤銷。When using certificates, the system validates that the client certificate has not been revoked, by checking that the client certificate is not in the revoked certificate list. 這項檢查可以藉由線上檢查或是核對快取的撤銷清單來執行。This check can be performed either by checking online or by checking against a cached revocation list. 將此屬性設定為 `NoCheck` 可以關閉撤銷檢查。Revocation checking can be turned off by setting this property to `NoCheck`. ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何設定這個屬性。The following code shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[S_UEX509ServiceCertificateAuthentication#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uex509servicecertificateauthentication/cs/client.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S_UEX509ServiceCertificateAuthentication#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uex509servicecertificateauthentication/vb/client.vb#2)] 這個屬性也可以在組態檔中設定。The property can also be set in a configuration file.

exception.span: 已嘗試在認證處於唯讀狀態時設定。

span.span: Attempted to set when credential is read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::StoreLocation TrustedStoreLocation { System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::StoreLocation get(); void set(System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::StoreLocation value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要在其內容中驗證用戶端憑證鏈結的受信任存放區位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the trusted store location under which context the client certificate chain is validated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會指定是否要使用電腦或使用者內容來驗證 X.509 憑證鏈結。This property specifies whether machine or user context will be used to verify the X.509 certificate chain. ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何設定這個屬性。The following code shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[S_UEX509ServiceCertificateAuthentication#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uex509servicecertificateauthentication/cs/client.cs#3)] [!code-vb[S_UEX509ServiceCertificateAuthentication#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uex509servicecertificateauthentication/vb/client.vb#3)] 這個屬性也可以在組態檔中設定。The property can also be set in a configuration file.

exception.span: 已嘗試在認證處於唯讀狀態時設定。

span.span: Attempted to set when credential is read-only.
